name: my-kitchen-garden
description: Managing a kitchen garden as a SAAS

scripts.start: cd mean && NODE_ENV=production node server.js && cd ../bower_components/marmiton-recherche-ingredient node server.js
scripts.postinstall: ./node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt && cd mean && npm install && cd ../bower_components/marmiton-recherche-ingredient && npm install
